title: Oil Edges Higher as Traders Weigh More US Control Over Venezuela
description: Oil edged higher as traders digested more measures from the US regarding Venezuela, including a plan to indefinitely control future crude sales and the seizure of two more sanctioned tankers.
content: Oil edged higher as traders digested more measures from the US regarding Venezuela, including a plan to indefinitely control future crude sales and the seizure of two more sanctioned tankers.
